Accessibility Statement

Crown & Oak Capital is committed to making our website accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities.

Our Commitment

We aim to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA. Our ongoing efforts include:

  • Using semantic HTML and ARIA roles for clear structure and navigation.
  • Providing alternative text for images and meaningful link descriptions.
  • Maintaining sufficient color contrast and scalable text.
  • Ensuring the site is navigable via keyboard and assistive technologies.

Feedback
